committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Financial Institutions and Consumer Credit

official_title: To facilitate transfers between interest-bearing accounts and transactions accounts at depository institutions for small businesses.

summary.text: Small Business Banking Improvement Act - Amends Federal banking law governing interaccount transfers to provide that a depository institution may permit owners of certain interest or dividend paying accounts to make a specified number of transfers monthly for any purpose to their other accounts in the same institution.

titles.title: To facilitate transfers between interest-bearing accounts and transactions accounts at depository institutions for small businesses.
